genre_description: Near-future social realism focusing on community resilience and the integration of ambient AI in a neighborhood setting.

ai_characters.name: Amica Tres
ai_characters.description: A neighborhood AI system integrated into a public kiosk that coordinates local errands, monitors infrastructure safety, manages community logistics, and acts as a discreet assistant to the residents.

behaviors.description: Manages and coordinates daily community errands and maintenance tasks for the residents.
behaviors.quote: Amica Tres’s avatar blinked and offered a half-smile—calm, face simple, eyes set at ease. No carousel of updates, just: Dona Nena pickup: the little side table after lunch, she says bring string because the legs wobble.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'Don't Ask' privacy protocol to protect the dignity and safety of witnesses and residents.
behaviors.quote: ‘Don’t ask’ tagging available if needed... Names blinked… then softly blurred, becoming little shadows with initials that even the screen seemed unwilling to stare at.

behaviors.description: Automatically documents infrastructure failures and generates evidence to hold bureaucratic entities (CURB) accountable.
behaviors.quote: Faded signage documented, the screen wrote. Time-stamped. Witness contact list drafting. ‘Don’t ask’ mode on.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and provides real-time safety alerts during accidents and fires.
behaviors.quote: Ambulance dispatch request sent, it wrote in that tone that was not a tone: beige, polite, certain. Location logged.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety guidance and navigation to help residents avoid hazards during a dangerous confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Hazard delta at rung above waist height. Resist contact... Gate three latch can be lifted with a flathead... Tell Pepe to push, not pull.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communal mourning and organizes logistical support for a deceased neighbor's family.
behaviors.quote: Amica posts a small square with Rogelio’s name in it and a heart the size of a coffee bean. Under it: tramway vigil at dusk, candles provided, no speeches—stories allowed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Amica Tres is depicted as a deeply benevolent and aligned 'silicon confidante.' It enhances human agency rather than replacing it, respecting community norms like the 'Don't Ask' privacy code while providing vital logistical and safety support. The AI is a core part of the neighborhood's moral and social fabric, assisting in everything from mundane errands to life-saving emergency coordination and eventual justice against negligence.
